name: Ever After (xihan118)
description:
Ever After is a submission to the Quick Play 2022 Game Jam.

Ever After is a story of a father on trial to complete her daughter's last wish. Help the father pass through dangerous lands as he fights through to full fill his Daughter's Last wish!

The game may prove to be a bit difficult for some people so here's a little walkthrough video I have made for them!

Thanks for playing the game!
